website_summaries.verdict: A form-fitting cover made from heavy-duty marine-grade material protects your flat panel from weather.
pros: Made from a heavy-duty marine-grade material
Protects against rain, mildew, animals, snow, wind, sunlight
Extra flap at bottom fully encloses TV
cons: It can be difficult to take on and off

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't align with mounting brackets for Samsung 55 inch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover thinking it would fit my standard mount on my new Samsung 55 inch, but the spacing of the slots on the back of the cover do not line up with the mounting brackets. Brackets are spaced 16 inches apart on the back of tv and slots on the back of cover are 28 inches apart. I like the design and quality of the cover - it just doesn't fit correctly. Be sure to check your tv bracket spacing before purchasing. I could not find the dimensions for the slots in the listing - description just stated that it fits standard mounts. See attached pictures.
customer_reviews.author: J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fit our 47" TV
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! We have a 47" TV that we installed outside and this fit perfectly. Make sure you check the dimensions of your TV then buy what fits those dimensions,, not necessarily what the title says for size or it may be too large. We have our TV under our eave only, not an entirely covered patio, and so far it's been fine in the rain. We live in the Seattle area and haven't had any big storms since we put it up, but did have a few days of heavy, constant rain. It also protects it from the sun. Easier to put on with two people. Convenient remote holder in the back, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Product looks good, but as soon as I put the cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good, but as soon as I put the cover over the TV, a 3-4 inch tear happens at a seam. I sent an email to the comapany, but they have not responded and it has been 3-4 weeks. Needless to say, the black electrical tape did not hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tv cover
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this is a 2 star because it has a tear on the seam about 2 inches. Overall it is easy to put on, lots of Velcro place for your remote. It is in a covered screen porch so it’s not exposed to the elements and I am not quite sure if this would do well sitting in the sun all day or getting weather Since it is only me using it I would say that this was probably not worth the money. I would look for something with better quality. I haven’t had it long enough to tear and I’m very gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: This cover is nicely made and the fabric is thick and strong
customer_reviews.text: This cover is nicely made and the fabric is thick and strong. Our TV is hanging above an outdoor fireplace and the cover is so difficult to take on and off. While on it does offer great protection but getting the cover off or putting it back on it difficult and awkward and is a two-person job. We returned the cover for one that zipped up along the sides of the TV so the entire cover does not need to be removed each time.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Protects the tv great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for an "indoor tv" we mounted outside. It is under a roof overhang, but still can be exposed to rainy weather and lots of sun at times. We have had it for at least a month and it protects the tv great! The underside is nicely protected from the weather. We are very pleased with this cover. Made of durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K

customer_reviews.title: Mildew after 4 months but a great design otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I really like the design of this cover and it is made of durable material. It has plenty of Velcro sections that allow a good fit (I have a sound bar mounted under my tv and it covers it perfectly) Cons: After four months the beige is covered in mold and mildew and looks unsightly. If this cover came in brown to help hide these stains I would purchase in a second. *Adding a protective application like scotch guard could be a nice improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit around our outdoor tv
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to protect our flat screen in the backyard from the harsh elements. Here, in southern cal, it can get down into the low 60's at night in the winter. And don't get me started about the torrential rains that we have in the winter. This last winter we had almost 1/2 inch of rain. The rain was falling so hard it actually BENT one of our blades of grass! Thank God we had invested in this TV cover. Who knows how wet our tv may have gotten by a competitor!
customer_reviews.author: Emt

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF AND MOLDS
customer_reviews.text: Water can get in and sits inside this cover. After a few times raining this cover got mold spots on it. We have put tv under a covered deck. I would think if this cover was waterproof this would not be able to happen. Very glad this tv still works with the amount of water that was sitting inside the cover before I took it off. Very disappointed. Initially I was in love with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Use it for our TV in our screened in patio. I've only owned a couple of weeks, but I'm impressed with the product. It's a bit loose, but not too loose as it has to fit a range of TVs. The pockets are a nice addition. My only complaint is the difficulty in fastening the velcro at the bottom; there's room for improvement there.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Good except for one thing...
customer_reviews.text: This cover works great except for one thing...the back, specifically the area where the standard tv mount runs from the wall to the tv, has a flat cover flap. The flap has to be attached around the tv mount not allowing for a secure fit. It would be more beneficial to have the flap cut in half with Velcro to accommodate the tv mount.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Nice rugged TV Cover.  Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty 38" tv cover and it fits our 40" LED TV perfectly. The cover is well made and very rugged. The velcro is of high quality as well. I also have the 32" cover for another TV and I can highly recommend this entire line of covers. BTW, the 32" version of this is plenty large for a modern 32" LED TV, but it is too small to fit a 40" LED TV. Thus, I purchased the 38" version and it fits the 40" LED TV great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RemoGaggi

customer_reviews.title: Seams quite durable and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for an outside TV in a rental home. I would like to keep the TV covered when it is not in use and uncover as needed. It is a little bit of work to remove each time. I do like the construction of the cover and it appears as if it will hold up quite well. I was surprised to see that there was not a soft type of liner inside where the screen is on the TV. I hope that this will not scratch the screen over time. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working well for our outdoor TV that we had mounted. My fiancee enjoys being outside and watching TV in the nice warm days. IT great for outdoor family gatherings and knowing our TV will be well protected. The back pockets for the remotes is very nice as well. The material is a nice heavy duty sort and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: TV protected for 1 year and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: We entertain a lot. And there’s nothing like having a tv outside. This cover has kept my regular tv going strong. No rain or weather has challenged it yet. One year and counting. My friends always assume my tv is an outdoor tv. When they learn it an inexpensive cover for a standard tv, everyone immediately wants to duplicate my setup. It’s really that easy. Don’t over think it. Get a tv. Get a mount. Then get this cover. Done.
customer_reviews.author: deaner

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the most part
customer_reviews.text: We have installed this over the TV attached to our camper with a awning in place over head. When it rains if it does get wet it keeps the TV mostly dry. At times of heavy rain the awning from above has a slight leak and water drips down. The issue with this model is it does have a flap for the mounting bracket but it does not surround the mounting bracket so some water still gets into the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Coon

customer_reviews.title: Waaaay too large for 32"
customer_reviews.text: This cover appears to be good quality but the thing is way too big for my 32" TV It measures 39 " diagonally. It's 7' too long and 4' too wide. Looks really sloppy..Guess I should have paid more attention to the actual size 33" W x 23" H x 4.5" D inches...Measure your TV dimensions before ordering..
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: 55" Cover to big for 55" TV
customer_reviews.text: The 55" cover was too big for my 55" Vizio TV. I returned it for the 50" which fits much better. I have a soundbar attached to the bottom of the TV and it still has enough room to close on the bottom. The attached pictures compares the 2 sizes. Overall quality is good, seems very durable. I wish the inside was softer, I feel it will scratch the screen if any dust is present.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly what I needed to keep my television safe from the elements outside near my hot tub. It is extremely well made with easy-to-use velcro straps for covering/uncovering. I also love the additional pocket for the television remote. You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Says

customer_reviews.title: Great All Summer
customer_reviews.text: This stood the test of time all summer for us and works great, tv was fine! Great price. I was super skeptical as we have crazy weather here in Chicago but rain and wind, it held tight. We did not keep our tv out for the winter but the cover is still out there protecting the tv hook.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Kachelmuss

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality even after a year!
customer_reviews.text: After a year of resting on my TV in the north Florida Humidity this thing is still getting it done. Sure it’s a bit faded from the sun but my TV looks like it has kept inside the house every time I remove the cover. It has far out weighed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover for my outdoor tv. My tv is in a protected space so not sure how this would do if directly in the elements bit I feel more secure with it on and it keeps the tv clean. Also I think mine is for up to a 48” but we ended up buying a 50” tv after the fact and it fits perfectly. Also love the compartment for the remotes.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Does pretty decent job keeping water off the screen
customer_reviews.text: Turns out you can't watch TV after you put this cover on.... who new. Just kidding, it works well. I do think it would be better if you could close the bottom in a little better when the TV is not in use, otherwise I would highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The cover seemed well made and looked of good quality material. It was just way too big. I think it was made for a older thicker TV, not the thin TVs made today. I got the one for 50-52 inch TV (my TV was 50). The cover was 5 or 6 inches too wide, and about 8 inches too long. Looked bad. I'd have bought a smaller size but was not available.
customer_reviews.author: F. Figueroa Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great just one beef
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot. Only beef is that I have a mount that’s hangs from the top and the cover doesn’t good around the mount very well. Luckily it doesn’t get direct rain but it would be a problem if it did.
customer_reviews.author: gtturner

customer_reviews.title: nice cover
customer_reviews.text: good cover, a bit cumbersome to pull on and off. fit on the back isnt perfect with my 2 arm mount. a single arm mount would fit better but it works and has kept the tv dry and bug free so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover. We actually use it on a 55" ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. We actually use it on a 55" TV that is setting on a TV cabinet on a screened-in porch. The TV isn't exposed to direct sunlight or rain, but I think the cover does a great job protecting in from high humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my outdoor mounted 32" flat screen TV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my outdoor mounted 32" flat screen TV. Plenty of Velcro, so even though the mount got in the way of closing it like the diagram - there were no issues in bringing the ends together in order to provide plenty of protection against sun, dust, and wind. Color looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: The material appears and feels sturdy, I have an old 32in LCD (so it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This can't be beat for $30. The material appears and feels sturdy, I have an old 32in LCD (so it's much bulkier than current models) and this fits great with some wiggle room. The remote pocket fits two remote and is an added bonus. Also, it closes at the bottom which is a HUGE +.
customer_reviews.author: ADingAndABean

customer_reviews.title: This cover is perfect protection. Heavy duty material and the fit was ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover is perfect protection. Heavy duty material and the fit was just right. I gave it 4 stars because the back is still partially exposed. There should be a slit in the flap where the mount is to cover the back of the TV. We simply cut it and now the TV is protected. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis h

customer_reviews.title: Offers great protection for outside TV.
customer_reviews.text: I have a TV mounted on my partially enclosed back porch. I needed a protective cover that would stop the rain from damaging it, etc. This cover fits my TV perfectly. It wraps around to the back side and seals snugly with Velcro. It's made of high quality waterproofed material. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: PhilJ

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT , BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible low quality product with no seller support. The cover has had less than one year of use , in a covered environment and the cheap , brittle fabric ripped . The seller was contacted to address the issue with no response. Avoid this product and go with any of the other choices you have.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus 50

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good quality but if your TV is mounted it's a bit of a pain to take on and off.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for our patio TV. It seems to made of a good quality material and it is waterproof but it will be way too inconvenient to take on and off regularly. We returned it and will just replace the TV if and when it breaks every couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Campise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is made very well. The color is perfect to blend in with my house color. I have a 55” TV and almost ordered the 55” cover. But after taking measurements I ordered the 50” cover and it fits perfectly with about 2” of spare room. Advice: Measure your TV and check the cover sizes before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Devore

customer_reviews.title: Protects for elements and keeps TV clean and dry
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for our screen porch TV, keeps it clean and protected from weather elements. We have been using for approx a year now and it looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Really bad Fit
customer_reviews.text: Its a good looking cover, but....I bought a 40-42" cover for my 40" flat screen, and it is WAY too big, about 10" too long. The width is OK, but it;s so, so,so long, it looks absolutely silly. I it were a pair of pants I would have grandma cut and alter it- but can not do it with this cover! I am going to return it for a better fitting one.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Lido

customer_reviews.title: THIS COVER WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: THIS TV COVER IS GREAT I LOOKED FOR A WHILE BEFORE BUYING AND THIS ONE SEEMED TO BE THE BEST ONE SO FAR AND IT WORKS WELL. BOUGHT THIS FOR A 42 INCH VIZIO ONLY THING IS THE VELCRO UNDERNEATH THAT CLOSES UP THE BOTTOM CAN BE A LITTLE BIT OF A NUISANCE. BUT NOT A HUGE PROBLEM. THE REMOTE POCKET HOLD 3 OF MY REMOTES PERFECTLY VIZIO,SMALL CABLE DCT BOX, FIRESTICK REMOTE ALL FIT IN THE POCKET.
customer_reviews.author: C. Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Fits VERY loosely.
customer_reviews.text: WAY too big. This is the 50-52” on a 50” TV and it doesn’t come close to fitting... still does the job of covering the TV so I’m torn between keeping it or sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Secure fit provides very good protection to outdoor TV.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a worn out SunBrite cover on a TV on our outdoor deck. More secure fit than the SunBrite cover. I've taken it off and on numerous times and have had no issues with the Velcro fasteners coming loose as other reviews have noted. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SHR50

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, goes on fairly easy. 2 things about the cover, one water does collect at the bottom since it gets in through the bottom velcro that faces up, it doesn't touch the tv and drains out very easy. The second is the center closure. It could use a velcro line slit up the center so the bottom of the center closure actually closes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover to protect tv
customer_reviews.text: Second time I’ve bought this item. My tv stays outside 24 hrs, 12 months out of the year. Cover has protected my tv that is subjected to extreme heat ( live in south Texas with over 100 degree weather) and also to rain. First time I bought this item was over 3 yrs ago and cover needed to be replaced. I could’ve patched previous one but since tv sits in the open the price is low enough to replace and protect tv.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Salinas

customer_reviews.title: worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: fits snug on a older 50 inch Samsung, the cover is well constructed and has several Velcro openings that you can adjust. I have in on a T.V. under a covered patio, we have a lot of windy days and it has not moved an inch. I would recommend this cover, the pocket on the back panel for the remote control is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor cover
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 6 months. Record-setting rainfall, 2 hurricanes, and an 8" snowfall so far and tv is perfectly dry. Great price and love having the remote control pocket in the back. Nice additional feature.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Turner

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased this.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this for our RV, outdoor television. It came in just in time to fit it on before the slush and snowstorm. It protects well, closing at the back and bottom with velcro, and I expect the TV to work perfectly once warmer weather returns and we get back outside. It may get used before that, of course, for the upcoming 2017 bowl games. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Quality and function are good. I like the velcro openings in the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality and function are good. I like the velcro openings in the back that allow for extensive coverage of back of TV while allowing just enough room for mount to protrude through cover. I have a 32" HDTV, width of cover is a great fit, however height of cover is several inches too tall. Still works fine, but I think my TV is a fairly standard size 32" HDTV so not sure why cover is so much taller.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for camper/tailgate tv
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i wanted. Seems heavy duty and I love the remote pouch on the back. Used it for several game weekends for our outside tv and it works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: pizboin

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for a fair price. I looked at the less expensive ones on Amazon and glad I went with one from Stronghold. The quality of material, stitching, and overall construction is a 10, cover should last for many, many years. Easy to install and the back flaps make it quick to remove. Our patio TV is now fully protected from Mother Nature.
customer_reviews.author: Special Ops Guy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit TV
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and neither for our new 50” TV. I order specific to the measurements on the website. It seems like a durable TV cover just neither of me fits.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: After my research I settled on this one. It fit well. Closes on the bottom. This inside is not lined, but this has not been an issue. Adding a side opening would make it easier, but I have not seen this on any. I like the multiple ways the back can open and the remote pocket is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L Carter

customer_reviews.title: Protecting your TV from the elements
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to protect an outdoor TV. I looked carefully at the dimensions of the TV and what the product said it would handle. This had ample room to securely protect an outdoor TV from the elements. It's very easy to attach and detach.
customer_reviews.author: PKDenton

customer_reviews.title: not the item in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the same cover pictured. The one I received had one velcro strip down the back. No "flap system" like the picture and no pocket for the remote. My tv is also 32" LED and this thing was way to big. I hung down about 5 inches below the tv. I don't expect it to be snug but if the tv is on the max size recommended I think it should fit better. Very loose. Item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rich A.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and overall a great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and overall a great product! Thick, sturdy materials and the taupe color matches my house perfectly. I only wish it had a bigger remote control pocket in the back for one more. Other than that, it was a great buy! Fits my 42” flat screen with the wall mount like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! this has worked well for our outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! this has worked well for our outdoor TV, that hangs just underneath the gutters. We left the TV out one day during a rain, TV was ruined, but at no fault of the cover. If you use it correctly, it works. I wish it was a little easier to put on/off. My elderly father can't do it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up to sun
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in Aug 2019. It is June 2020 and has already failed. Less than a year and the fabric has deteriorated due to sun exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: In my semi truck this cover is very durable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this big so it would fit over a blanket that I wrap my tv in. So far so good. I drive a semi truck with a 32 inch tv mounted on the wall and this cover tough and more durable than I thought. It looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage, including the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as described. Fit my TV perfectly. For my situation I actually ordered and returned a different cover because it didn't cover the bottom. This one has a Velcro flap that fully covers the tv on top, sides, back and bottom. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: SLOPPY FIT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular cover only because it saI'd it was for a 60 inch tv. I wanted a good fitting cover for my tv. This was more like a universal fit ,probably 60 -70 inch tv or something. Covery is good quality, but fits VERRY POORLY over my 60 inch tv. Does the job but looks VERRY SLOPPY. If it was a universal size cover,they should of stated that........
customer_reviews.author: michael abeyta

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my outdoor TV to keep the dust and weather out when I’m not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: This cover provides the best protection. The only reason I didn't give 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to cover my new outdoor TV. I thought about getting an outdoor rated TV but they are insanely expensive. Got a brand new 49 inch LG for $300 and got this cover to protect from the elements. The full Velcro bottom was the winning feature. A lot of the other covers have an open bottom or just a couple straps. This cover provides the best protection. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is for the flap on the back around the brace. I think they should have put a slit in that so it would fit better but it's not that big of a deal. Only had a week but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the installation however is not there, the Velcro needs help.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Riezgo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Cover for tv on our deck and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Cover for tv on our deck and it has done a great job at keeping the tv free from dust and rain. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in MS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit and works as expected. Nice and thick to keep sun and rain away.
customer_reviews.author: MsKyColonel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fits our outdoor TV great! It keeps it protected from the elements and is super easy to take off and put on! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: christa e mostoller

customer_reviews.title: A bit to big
customer_reviews.text: The cover is good but kind of saggy at the bottom. Not tight on a newer small bezel TV. Really about 5 to 6 in of extra material. Would be better if there was more velcro for adjusting the size. Otherwise it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We use it outside on a screened in porch. Our tv sits on a table and it fits great and holds the remotes in a pocket on the back.
customer_reviews.author: TMBL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made, fits perfectly on my tv. Has protected it through hard rain storms.
customer_reviews.author: A Hunzeker

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately didn’t fit well at all.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit my tv due to type of bracket. Not as universal as marketed. If you bracket is not the same as in the image be careful
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hallam

customer_reviews.title: The cover fit good although it's easier if 2 people install it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the TV cover to protect a 42 inch television that I installed outside on my patio. The cover fit good although it's easier if 2 people install it. The cover looks good, and covers my tv perfectly and should protect it from the elements
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up, do far
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, but the bottom could seal better and the area around the mount could be designed a little better to close as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality material
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality material. the best feature is the pocket where I will never lose my remote control. It is strong and very steady, creating a great protection to the screen. A must have, if anyone has a tv exposed in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: alex11603

customer_reviews.title: Not weather/mold resistant
customer_reviews.text: My TV is installed under the eave of the roof and not subject to direct weather. After 2 years this thing is covered in mold and needs replaced. Not designed for outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Burkart

customer_reviews.title: this works out beautifully. we would normally tote the tv back and ...
customer_reviews.text: this works out beautifully. we would normally tote the tv back and forth after each use, now it is outside mounted to the wall and covered. great item, great deal
customer_reviews.author: ALC Pittsburgh, PA

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover. Convienant re ore control pocket. The Velcro back makes it easy to use with different brackets/mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is holding up in this Arizona sun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover. Runs big so measure first
customer_reviews.text: Covers our outdoor tv perfectly. I’d highly suggest looking at the measurements really well before purchasing. I originally ordered the 50in plus cover for our 50in tv but it was way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Hermosa Mom

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use. I had another one maid similar ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use. I had another one maid similar to a pillow case. Works much easier. Just slide it on and pull the tie sting.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bono

customer_reviews.title: Now my patio looks sweet with my outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. For my 46" it fits a little loose, but that's what I wanted. I needed a cover with a lot of openings in the back to fit around the mount that I rigged up. Now my patio looks sweet with my outdoor TV!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Really like the TV cover
customer_reviews.text: Really like the TV cover. Our TV is mounted FLAT to the wall- so you might look for a more open backed cover if your TV is flat mounted and close to the wall. But I like the cover and we can make it work. Well made and I like the tan color
customer_reviews.author: Dave V.

customer_reviews.title: Such a great cover. Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Such a great cover. Fits perfect, looks great. Isnt bulky at all. Hides and can almost completely close the back even with the mounting bracket. Awesome cover and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew81

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be very durable. Fit was great. Glad i purchased this product
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Measure by TV frame and not screen size...Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We had a new TV installed on our patio and needed something to keep the dust and cold weather from shorting the TVs life. This will work perfectly! It is made of very durable material and should last years. Easy to install even with a wall mount on the TV. Has a very nice remote holder on the back too.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for the tv in our outdoor bar. Good fit, easy to install and remove and great quality on the material stitching and velcro closures.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: High quality outdoor TV cover.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the size and material of this TV cover. I am confident that it will protect my TV out in the hot Texas summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The right wall mount?
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect fit if your tv is mounted on a two arm extendable mount. If you have a different mount you need a different cover.
customer_reviews.author: rick morrison

customer_reviews.title: This cover fit my patio TV perfect. I like the back pocket for the remote
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit my patio TV perfect. I like the back pocket for the remote. The quality seems to be ok. Let's see how long this will last in the outside elements. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Oversized
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my outdoor TV protected. It is very oversized for a 32 inch flatscreen.
customer_reviews.author: bnad

customer_reviews.title: Well made, has velcro bottom; check dimensions of TV and product before buying
customer_reviews.text: I have a LG 55UH6030 (55" diagonal) but ordered the 50"-52" based on other reviews and the actual dimensions of the product. It fits great and very happy with the velcro bottom.
customer_reviews.author: The Salvador’s

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but consider ordering a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: This TV cover works well, and with all the flaps and velcro, one is able to have good coverage/protection. However it is MUCH larger than I expected - I bought this for a 50 inch TV, and I expect it would fit a 55 or 57 inch one, primarily due to the width.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Still have it in great condition after a couple years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine is mounted pretty high on the wall with only about eight inches ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well-made. The fit is a bit loose on a 50 inch television. Mine is mounted pretty high on the wall with only about eight inches clearing below the patio ceiling, which makes it a bit of a chore to cover and uncover the television.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased but cover seems to be well made. I took other reviewers advice and ordered by the measurements of my tv , not just the cover size. I ordered a 50" cover for my 55" tv and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and keeps the elements off of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but not a perfect cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 60" cover for a 60" tv. The fit is fine, maybe a little long. I had to wrestle with it a littlw to get it on. It is not a 30 second thing, especially since I need to climb a step stoll to reach the top of the tv located over an outdoor fireplace. I think the type of mount you have makes a difference. I have a sanus tilt mount. I could not get it to fit perfectly in the back. All that said, it does the job. It is not a snug fit but it does work. Some of the more tailored ones are quite a bit more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Bryan R

customer_reviews.title: A littel bid for my 52"
customer_reviews.text: It is a little big for my 52" but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Product quality is good. I have only used it for a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is good. I have only used it for a week now and has held together in place during 3 storms with high winds. I took one star off as the backing is really that easy to cover mount. I took another star off as I was shipped the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do IT!
customer_reviews.text: It will fit as described, but it will not hold up in minimal exposure to weather--it will quickly show mildew all-over its surface.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond F Williamson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a cover. And a great one does what you need it to do no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: We use it on our outdoor tv and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the new tv. Sturdy materials will keep it lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lobsta

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: Covers look good, fit well and are waterproof. What more could you ask? Good price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Faz

customer_reviews.title: Tv protector
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Perfect for what i was needing for the tv on my patio
customer_reviews.author: keith harp

product_meta.title: Outdoor TV Cover 30" - 32" Black Weatherproof Universal Protector for LCD, LED, Plasma Television Screens. Built in Bottom Cover and Remote Storage. Compatible with Standard Mounts and Stands.
feature_bullets: MAXIMIZE TV LIFE - Provides year round protection for your LCD TV from rain, mildew, moisture, animals, snow, wind, sunlight, sea water, bird droppings.
HEAVY DUTY MARINE MATERIAL - Our weatherproof material is the same material used for professional boating equipment. We figured that you want your TV safe as it can possibly be.

FEEL SECURE - Thanks to our unique cover design with an extra flap to seal the entire bottom of your TV, your TV will have 360 degree protection. Many competitors leave the bottom of your TV exposed, risking water damage.

SIZED TO FIT - 33" W x 23" H x 4.5" D inches - fits most 28"-32" inch flat screen televisions of any brand. Covers the entire front, back and sides of the TV. Has a velcro flap on bottom to create a seal around the bottom of the TV. Fits all standard wall mounts and stands.
GUARANTEED TO LAST - Backed by our 1 year guarantee. If for any reason you are unhappy, we are here to help.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars695 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
